mapper.select: SELECT TROBL_ID, TROBL_NM, TROBL_KND, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM065' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND CODE = TROBL_KND) AS TROBL_KND_NM, TROBL_DC, DATE_FORMAT(TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME, TROBL_RQESTER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(TROBL_REQUST_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS TROBL_REQUST_TIME, TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT, TROBL_OPETR_NM, DATE_FORMAT(TROBL_PROCESS_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS TROBL_PROCESS_TIME, PROCESS_STTUS, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM068' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND CODE = PROCESS_STTUS) AS PROCESS_STTUS_NM, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNTROBLINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND TROBL_ID = #{troblId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNTROBLINFO (TROBL_ID, TROBL_NM, TROBL_KND, TROBL_DC, TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME, TROBL_RQESTER_NM, PROCESS_STTUS, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{troblId}, #{troblNm}, #{troblKnd}, #{troblDc}, #{troblOccrrncTime}, #{troblRqesterNm}, #{processSttus}, now(), #{frstRegisterId}, now(), #{lastUpdusrId})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNTROBLINFO SET TROBL_NM = #{troblNm}, TROBL_KND = #{troblKnd}, TROBL_DC = #{troblDc}, TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME = #{troblOccrrncTime}, TROBL_RQESTER_NM = #{troblRqesterNm}, PROCESS_STTUS = #{processSttus}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE TROBL_ID = #{troblId}

UPDATE COMTNTROBLINFO SET PROCESS_STTUS = #{processSttus},
TROBL_REQUST_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),
TROBL_REQUST_TIME = null,
LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE TROBL_ID = #{troblId}
